actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Defense Education Act of 1958 to permit a reduction in institution contributions to student loan funds on account of expenditures in administering the program.

summary.text: Reduces the required deposit by an institution of higher learning to the student loan fund by an amount equal to the reasonable expenses incurred by such institution in administering its loan program under the National Defense Education Act of 1958. (Amends 20 U.S.C. 424)

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Defense Education Act of 1958 to permit a reduction in institution contributions to student loan funds on account of expenditures in administering the program.
